name: SuperTrains 2
description:
Try this new FREE version of the long anticipated sequel to the hugely popular original SuperTrains game!

Drive the SuperTrain around the railroad and lengthen your train by picking up StarWagons!
Avoid running into the Red Trains and the Dark Cars, and don't crash into the Junction Skulls!
Collect the StarWagons and progress through the levels!
+20 new tracks!
Easy,Medium,Difficult, and Very Difficult settings!
New faster speed system!

Upper levels feature Attack Helicopter and Fire Breathing Dragon challenge!

Unlock upper levels by purchasing the Full Version!

Easy to learn....Difficult to Master!
